column4: Necessary name table entry according Monotype: NID 2
MS NID 16 + NID 17 should match NID 1 (+2). Otherwise cross platform compatibility does not work between Mac (uses NID 16+17) and Windows (uses NID 1+2). (Jan 2019)
column5: (NID 16 + 'Space' + NID 17) 'Encode Sans S<mark>emiCondensed Semi</mark>Bold' ≠ 'Encode Sans SmCnd SmBold' (NID 1).
